weekly_top_story.headline: Government Shutdown Continues; CDC Researchers Miss Infectious Disease Meeting
weekly_top_story.summary: The ongoing government shutdown has resulted in CDC researchers missing a pivotal conference on infectious diseases, which could impact public health efforts.

stories.headline: Consumer Healthcare Industry News Round-Up: 27th October 2025
stories.summary: Recent developments in the consumer healthcare industry include updates on over-the-counter products and potentially evolving regulations.
